message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand your position, Bob, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product and its value. Could you consider $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $11,500?
